name: Boden Relaxed Linen Tiered Dress
details: Looking for a head-turning dress that's ultra-comfortable? You've found it. This summery style's three-quarter fluted sleeves have impact, while the relaxed fit and tiered skirt guarantee a floaty feel. We've added a flattering V-neck, too, along with practical side pockets. Both cool and breathable, the linen fabric is hardwearing and ready for endless sunny-day wear.

name: Boden Imogen Halterneck Maxi Dress
details: Meet Imogen. She’s primed for a night on the tapas and summer wine. She’s even got an elasticated waistband – ideal.
neck_line: Halterneck ties
review_description: This dress is as beautiful as the other reviewers say. Well done Boden. It feels amazing. I have two comments though (which is why 4 stars rather than 5). The first is that for me (size 6 petite) the bust is on the larger side. I can't bear to return the dress though so am going to make it work. My other comment is that the elastic in the high waist band is twisted. But I am going to fix this. A fabulous dress!

Love everything about this dress! Effortlessly stylish, low maintenance(machine washable), cotton fabric with colourful ikat print(colours are mix of pastel and bright), halterneck ties allow adjustment fit and coverage at bust creating v-neck, sexy backless look. Overall a winner! Well done, Boden..

name: Boden Sienna Jersey Maxi Dress
details: Floor-sweeping and flowing, there's a reason the maxi dress is a timeless go-to. This elegant design features a V-neckline at the front which is mirrored on the back, as well as an effortlessly flattering ruched waistband. We've crafted it from a drapey viscose-blend jersey that feels soft and smooth, and has a little bit of stretch for comfort.

review_description: Hands down my favorite dress Boden makes. I hope they never stop making this! At 5' 2" I'm so grateful for a maxi dress that comes in petite sizes! Runs true to size. I have multiple patterns and always receive compliments when I wear them. Easy to throw on and go while still looking put together.

Lovely dress, colour and pattern true to pic. I had to size up in this one though, too tight across the bust and waist in my usual size 12. I am 5'10 so this becomes more of a long midi than a maxi, but looks really nice with flip flops or slightly dressier with espadrilles for summer.
occasions: Flattering fitted shape through bust and waist with a flared skirt

This showerproof jacket folds up into a pocket and can be popped in a backpack, ready to be revealed to wide-eyed friends if the weather takes a turn.

It looks perfect for my grandson. I'm sure he will like it for his birthday.

name: Boden Pointelle Knitted Midi Dress
details: Summer's calling. To tell you you look hot. And that you need this knitted midi dress.
review_description: I have about 25 Boden dresses and can say this is one of my favourites. It is so flattering and just skims over those bits you'd rather not emphasise, but isn't at all shapeless.. Hangs beautifully and just the right weight. Makes me feel elegant and stylish. Would definitely buy in other colours.

This is a gorgeous dress but as so often with Boden knitted Dresses it is too short. The proportions aren't right and can't be the same as worn by the model on website. Am so sad to be sending it back because everything else about it is perfect. Perhaps it could be done in a longer length also.

details: Effortless elegance is just part of the package with this wear-it-anywhere midi dress. It's crafted from cool linen fabric and features a smocked bodice, plus gathering at the waist for bonus points when it comes to flattering fits. A modern square neckline combines with short puffed sleeves, finished with frilly cuffs – now you can rely on those to add eye-catching detail.

name: Boden V-Neck Jersey Dress
details: When playful meets feminine, this flippy dress is the result. It features a sharp V-neck with soft gathers at the V centre, and thanks to a seam that sits naturally at your waist, the fit is flattering and comfortable (win-win). To finish off, there are stretchy ruffled cuffs that add gentle volume to the short sleeves.

A really, pretty, flattering dress. I already own this in the Larkspur and wanted a second. Unfortunately the Diamond Leaf colours did not quite work with my complexion so reluctantly I sent it back. Beautiful dress though, if these are your colours. Returns dealt with brilliantly by Boden, as always.

review_description: I had to act quickly on this one. I could see the shrimp dress was selling fast. While it cost a lot more than I'd have liked to pay for a casual dress, once it arrived any concerns I had disappeared. I ordered the 12L and I'm 175cms tall and it hits right at the bottom of my knee. No tightness or gaping across the bust and it kindly glides over my ample bottom and thighs. I wear slips underneath my unlined dresses to give a smoother outline and will do the same with this dress. The only issue I can see is that it will require ironing every wear and this might wear thin after a while, especially if I'm on holiday. Apart from this, it's a well designed dress and I'm glad I dared to buy something a little different.

Unlike a lot of the other reviews I was happy with my usual size for a comfy, relaxed fit. The print really is super fun and looks just as good in real life as it does in the model shots. As always, thank you for pockets!!!

Perfect for hot summer days. A little tricky to figure out the right bra to wear or don't wear one at all! Love the fabric and crochet neckline.

name: Boden Flora Linen Mini Dress
details: Summer nights go best with a printed linen mini dress – and orange wine, obvs.
length: Summer nights go best with a printed linen mini dress – and orange wine, obvs.
review_description: When I first tried the dress on I liked it but didn't love it..I was going to keep it anyway but the more I looked at it on me when I tried it on the more I critiqued it.The fit was nice but the sleeves much too long .I could get away with pushing up the arm a bit due to elasticated cuff but thenI realised the materiel was just too overwhelming for my petite 5,1 height ,plus throw in a large chest it was just not great.Ok but not great compared to better fit Boden dresses from last year.Secondly the main background colour was off white .I prefer a crisper white or alternatively a cream.The length however was perfect.Just on the knee therefore for a taller lady this length maybe too short but then again boden describes as a mini length.In summary I think this dress would suit lots of ladies but just not perfect enough for me personally.Oh and the print and feel of the linen was lovely.Sent back.
occasions: Summer nights go best with a printed linen mini dress – and orange wine, obvs.
Fit & flare shape

name: Boden Halterneck Jersey Maxi Dress
details: Get strap-happy with our halterneck maxi dress. With its criss-cross design at the front, and created from jersey fabric, it makes a flattering and comfortable option. It's fitted through the bodice, nipped in at the waist and flares out to an elegant flippy skirt. There's a lot to love about summer, but here's another thing to add to the list: this style comes in a choice of colourful floral prints.
neck_line: Get strap-happy with our halterneck maxi dress. With its criss-cross design at the front, and created from jersey fabric, it makes a flattering
length: Get strap-happy with our halterneck maxi dress. With its criss-cross design at the front, and created from jersey fabric, it makes a flattering
review_description: Oh thank goodness. I have spent months trying to find a dress for a destination wedding and as a short, round woman I was wading through the endless puff sleeved tiered maxi Little House on the Prairie dresses that seem to be all that other stores are selling this season. This fits beautifully, feels great and the neckline draws the attention upwards plus I don't need to worry about jewellery.

I wanted to love this dress in spite of the challenging neckline and what to wear to contain the girls. I bought size 14 US in black and was surprised it fit well except for the bodice that gaped on the sides. Also the front bands rode up to my neck as if the back of the dress was too heavy for them. I considered buying a smaller size to have the sides/underarms fit. But the neckline bands riding towards my neck were a dealbreaker. So sad as the print and length are lovely.

review_description: Dress was exactly as described. As I am small in height I asked for petite, which I received. Still slightly too long. Not a problem will have it shortened. It would be an idea to add length to assist customers

I absolutely love this dress! I wore it for a spa weekend away and got so many compliments. The cut is flattering and the style looks almost Grecian. It looks just as good over a bikini as it does dressed up for the evening. The jersey feels beautifully soft and swishy around my legs.

name: Boden Knitted Lace Maxi Dress
details: Knit hot. Or, knits for when it's hot.
review_description: Beautiful dress, loved the colour. But I wanted a maxi dress, not a midi. I am 5ft10 and ordered the regular as there was no tall version of the dress. This has previously worked fine with other Boden maxi dresses. However, this dress ends at mid calf on me, so I have had to send it back. A real shame, as had it been a few inches longer, it would have been perfect.

I'm 5ft 1 and I bought the petite length. I feel the photography is slightly misleading as it implies the dress comes up quite high, with enough coverage up top to make it suitable for work. But in fact, the straps are about two inches too long for me, thereby creating a very low neckline. Admittedly this gives me a fabulous cleavage, but it's definitely not office-appropriate, especially for those of us with larger cup sizes. I was debating whether to shorten the straps or not, but I think I'm going to leave them as they are and keep the dress for going to the park on hot days. It's a really good quality fabric with a good weight, not flimsy, with plenty of stretch so it still fits even if you're a larger size on your bottom half.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Florence Cut-out Midi Dress
details: Get you a dress that does both. (Puff-sleeves and tiers plus cutouts and a look-at-me print.)
length: Get you a dress that does both. (Puff-sleeves and tiers plus cutouts and a look-at-me print.)
review_description: The pattern and style of this dress are really pretty. I like the cut outs, the neckline and sleeves. It looked a little more 'dressy' on than I was expecting, so would wear for evenings out or summer events rather than every day.

I fell in love with the colour, pattern and style of this dress. Unfortunately, at 5' 10", the waistband on this dress was too high for me. With the volume of fabric and the placement of the cutouts, it is too obvious that the waistband is out of place and I will have to return. As per a previous review, I found the cutouts appear larger on me than the model in the picture. I'm between a 10 and a 12 and found the smaller size a better fit in this style.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Notch Neck Tiered Jersey Dress
details: The sort of dress that lends itself to 8am coffee runs and spotting a flower market on the way back. (Read: effortless.)
review_description: I like this dress but didn't feel it was special enough to keep. Maybe could have done with being a bit shorter.

Just arrived and it went straight into my closet! Cannot wait to wear it to work and around, Super comfortable and looks amazing. I'm 5'9" and bought a regular. Sometimes order long from Boden but did not need to on this dress.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Crew Neck Jersey Dress
details: Our crew-neck dress is set for first-outfit-to-reach-for status on warm days. Why? Well, there's the semi-fitted shape, with an above-the-knee skirt. Note the smocking, and the gathers through the skirt – did someone say flattering? Yep, and they also said, "pockets."
review_description: I got this dress in the green print (which is no longer available -- too bad, it's beautiful). I'm 5'2", got the petite, and the dress hits just above my knees. The ruching is below my (smallish) bust, but I could imagine this dress not fitting as well on someone with a large bust. The material is so soft and comfortable, and doesn't wrinkle (it traveled well through 6 plane flights!). It's dressy enough for somewhat dressy occasions, but not too fancy for casual occasions. I wore it with Tevas for casual occasions, but it would look great with espadrilles (which I don't own). I LOVE that it has pockets. LOVE. And unlike in some dresses, the pockets don't create a lumpy look.

So here's the thing, my soon to be 12 year daughter is already 5'6" tall and 115 lbs and is in that odd space where she can't wear mini boden anymore (so sad), but ladies' clothes are either too low cut or just too old looking for her. This dress finally fits our bill for a cute, appropriate cut dress for a pre-teen, perfect for school pictures, church, or the occasional family dinner out! I plan to grab this dress in a few more colors. I purchased her a 2R in the coastal design print for reference and it hits right above knee. And she is crazy about the pockets!
occasions: Our crew-neck dress is set for first-outfit-to-reach-for status on warm days. Why? Well, there's the semi-fitted shape, with an above-the-knee
Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Jersey Embroidered Midi Dress
details: If 'looking sultry at the market' was a midi dress, it would be this one.
review_description: I've been looking for a boho style white long-sleeved midi dress for ages and it looked like this number was it - the square neck, flared sleeves and embroidery grabbed my attention. I'm normally a 10 in dresses and skirts but saw this was coming up a bit big for other reviewers so I sized down to an 8 PET. When it arrived the size was bang on, but the fit didn't suit me at all. The elasticated waist meant the dress fell really strangely on my curvy frame and wasn't flattering at all. Also uncomfortable as the waist felt scratchy. Sadly had to return it. Please do more dresses in this style Boden but with wider waist bands that fall nicely?
Beautiful dress! It is a bit heavier than I thought. Though, perfect for a cool summer evening. Looking forward to wearing through the rest of summer.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

details: When playful meets feminine, this flippy dress is the result. It features a sharp V-neck with soft gathers at the V centre, and thanks to a seam that sits naturally at your waist, the fit is flattering and comfortable (win-win). To finish off, there are stretchy ruffled cuffs that add gentle volume to the short sleeves.

review_description: This dress is gorgeous, the fabric is lovely and the colours are so nice, the fit is excellent. I found the fit to be correct and the length is also just right for me.

5 stars awarded for the beauty and design of this dress but then 3 stars removed for the fact that, despite the cost, it has no lining which means that it is completely see-through on the skirt! It fits true to size and looks great on. The regular is a true midi length on me and I'm 5 foot 3. As much as I loved the fit and design, it had to be sent back. Very overpriced.

name: Boden Relaxed Linen Tiered Dress
details: Looking for a head-turning dress that's ultra-comfortable? You've found it. This summery style's three-quarter fluted sleeves have impact, while the relaxed fit and tiered skirt guarantee a floaty feel. We've added a flattering V-neck, too, along with practical side pockets. Both cool and breathable, the linen fabric is hardwearing and ready for endless sunny-day wear.
neck_line: the relaxed fit and tiered skirt guarantee a floaty feel. We've added a flattering V-neck, too, along with practical side pockets. Both cool and breathable, the linen fabric is hardwearing and ready for endless sunny-day wear.
length: Looking for a head-turning dress that's ultra-comfortable? You've found it. This summery style's three-quarter fluted sleeves have impact, while
review_description: I had to act quickly on this one. I could see the shrimp dress was selling fast. While it cost a lot more than I'd have liked to pay for a casual dress, once it arrived any concerns I had disappeared. I ordered the 12L and I'm 175cms tall and it hits right at the bottom of my knee. No tightness or gaping across the bust and it kindly glides over my ample bottom and thighs. I wear slips underneath my unlined dresses to give a smoother outline and will do the same with this dress. The only issue I can see is that it will require ironing every wear and this might wear thin after a while, especially if I'm on holiday. Apart from this, it's a well designed dress and I'm glad I dared to buy something a little different.

Unlike a lot of the other reviews I was happy with my usual size for a comfy, relaxed fit. The print really is super fun and looks just as good in real life as it does in the model shots. As always, thank you for pockets!!!

name: Boden Halterneck Jersey Maxi Dress
details: Get strap-happy with our halterneck maxi dress. With its criss-cross design at the front, and created from jersey fabric, it makes a flattering and comfortable option. It's fitted through the bodice, nipped in at the waist and flares out to an elegant flippy skirt. There's a lot to love about summer, but here's another thing to add to the list: this style comes in a choice of colourful floral prints.
neck_line: Get strap-happy with our halterneck maxi dress. With its criss-cross design at the front, and created from jersey fabric, it makes a flattering
length: Get strap-happy with our halterneck maxi dress. With its criss-cross design at the front, and created from jersey fabric, it makes a flattering
review_description: Oh thank goodness. I have spent months trying to find a dress for a destination wedding and as a short, round woman I was wading through the endless puff sleeved tiered maxi Little House on the Prairie dresses that seem to be all that other stores are selling this season. This fits beautifully, feels great and the neckline draws the attention upwards plus I don't need to worry about jewellery.

I wanted to love this dress in spite of the challenging neckline and what to wear to contain the girls. I bought size 14 US in black and was surprised it fit well except for the bodice that gaped on the sides. Also the front bands rode up to my neck as if the back of the dress was too heavy for them. I considered buying a smaller size to have the sides/underarms fit. But the neckline bands riding towards my neck were a dealbreaker. So sad as the print and length are lovely.
occasions: and comfortable option. It's fitted through the bodice, nipped in at the waist and flares out to an elegant flippy skirt. There's a lot to love about summer, but here's another thing to add to the list: this style comes in a choice of colourful floral prints.

name: Boden Crew Neck Jersey Dress
details: Our crew-neck dress is set for first-outfit-to-reach-for status on warm days. Why? Well, there's the semi-fitted shape, with an above-the-knee skirt. Note the smocking, and the gathers through the skirt – did someone say flattering? Yep, and they also said, "pockets."
review_description: I got this dress in the green print (which is no longer available -- too bad, it's beautiful). I'm 5'2", got the petite, and the dress hits just above my knees. The ruching is below my (smallish) bust, but I could imagine this dress not fitting as well on someone with a large bust. The material is so soft and comfortable, and doesn't wrinkle (it traveled well through 6 plane flights!). It's dressy enough for somewhat dressy occasions, but not too fancy for casual occasions. I wore it with Tevas for casual occasions, but it would look great with espadrilles (which I don't own). I LOVE that it has pockets. LOVE. And unlike in some dresses, the pockets don't create a lumpy look.

So here's the thing, my soon to be 12 year daughter is already 5'6" tall and 115 lbs and is in that odd space where she can't wear mini boden anymore (so sad), but ladies' clothes are either too low cut or just too old looking for her. This dress finally fits our bill for a cute, appropriate cut dress for a pre-teen, perfect for school pictures, church, or the occasional family dinner out! I plan to grab this dress in a few more colors. I purchased her a 2R in the coastal design print for reference and it hits right above knee. And she is crazy about the pockets!

name: Boden Claudia Textured Knitted Dress
details: We've given this dress plenty of extra details. That means an all-over textured stitch pattern for an intricate effect, combined with elegant scalloped edging around the crew neck, cuffs and hem. Knitted from pure combed cotton, this style is soft and naturally breathable. The semi-fitted shape is flattering and feels all-day comfortable, too. For the full knitted look, pair with the matching cardigan.
review_description: Agree with previous reviews. Gorgeous dress, but too thick for hot summers day, need to wear when weather cooler. Does have removable slip underneath, so could potentially wear without as long as choose underwear carefully! Sized down, got 10L, usually 12R in Boden, dress came just above the knee (am 5'4) the regular would have defo been too short for myself.

Looks good in the photos but the material is way too thick and it's boxy on and not flattering. Boden, please bring back all of the Ottoman dresses you used to have! Those were amazing! I'm not sure why you stopped making them but please make them again!!!

name: Boden Back Detail Broderie Dress
details: Broderie on sunny days – the sartorial equivalent of ice cream in the park. Please keep off the grass.
review_description: As other reviewers have stated, the back buttons come unfastened with any movement. It's not too tight in the chest either so it has to be the button design. Also, tall sizes are delayed until September, which didn't help me since I needed a dress for a wedding in August. I could almost pass on the length with flats, but the buttons are a shame so I had to return. I'm 36C and ordered 8R and it felt tts. The green color is perfect.

I initially ordered this in my usual size 10, and it was deeply unflattering as it swamped me (I'm only 5ft and would usually go for petite). Reordered in size 8 and it's perfect - I'm delighted! Beautiful high quality material, fully lined, and I love the back detail. Yes the buttons pop undone, but the neckline is large enough to slip it on and off without touching the buttons, so I'm planning on stitching the back closed which will mean this doesn't matter. Now I'm keeping my fingers crossed that the white version comes back in stock in size 8...
occasions: Broderie on sunny days – the sartorial equivalent of ice cream in the park. Please keep off the grass.
Semi-fitted shape

Just arrived and it went straight into my closet! Cannot wait to wear it to work and around, Super comfortable and looks amazing. I'm 5'9" and bought a regular. Sometimes order long from Boden but did not need to on this dress.

name: Boden Ruched Waist Jersey Midi Dress
details: An elegant midi dress which is perfect for morning meetings AND margaritas? We're in. The chic V-neck and full skirt create a beautiful shape, whilst the fixed wrap and ruching at the waist are supremely flattering. The ballet style sleeves finish at the elbow and the viscose-blend jersey feels soft and smooth (plus, it has a little bit of stretch for comfort).

name: Boden Ruffle Fixed Wrap Jersey Dress
details: There are sleeveless dresses, then there are extra-special sleeveless dresses. Our above-knee jersey style is the latter. The fixed wrap front is trimmed with a row of fluttery ruffles that run along the deep V-neckline and around the armholes. A detachable belt gives the waist defined shape. And, of course, we haven't forgotten the pockets – they're hidden neatly in the side seams.

This dress is so short even in the L length. Anyone taller than I am would have a tough time with the length and constantly pulling it down. I am very disappointed with the direction that Biden is taking in its design and who are their fit models? Clothing does not fit like their classic styles before. No more ordering fir me.
Beautiful light blue colour and lovely neckline. Very easy to wear love it.

name: Boden Ruched Bodice Dress
details: For treading that fine line between ‘absolutely smoking’ and not upstaging the bride.
review_description: Lovely dress in pure cotton. Good fit but sadly returned as don't think I'll have the occasion to wear it. Someone else should snap it up though!

I have been ordering several dresses for an upcoming wedding and this 1 is my favorite so far. I got it in blue and I do like the color. The ruching detail is very nice. I initially ordered a 16 based on the measurements but ended up having to go with a 14... might even be able to do a 12. I got it on sale but I don't think I would pay 180 for it... The fabric is nice and light which can be a pro for summer but it just doesn't feel worth 180. Also, if I keep it I will have to get it hemmed for it to actually be a midi dress which is a little surprising because I am 5'7".

name: Boden Empire Detail Jersey Dress
details: A summery one-and-done dress: easy to wear, goes with everything, details that say 'I made an effort'.
review_description: I bought this and a similar navy blue midi dress thinking one - or both - of them would be great for an upcoming vacation. I should have paid more attention to the reviews. I have a bunch of Boden dresses - all in US size 12. (And I am even a little on the heavy size right now: 5'5 and about 175 lbs.) I was absolutely swimming in this dress. It was at least 2 sizes too big. So sad
This dress is delightfully bright and perfect for summer parties. It does run a bit large in the top. I am usually a size 10/12 and had to size down to an 8 to get it to fit right.
occasions: A summery one-and-done dress: easy to wear, goes with everything, details that say 'I made an effort'.
Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Grace Flutter Sleeve Dress
details: A dress made for sauntering in front of sunsets. Going away? That crinkle fabric packs like a dream.
review_description: I wanted so badly to love this dress! The pattern and fabric are lovely. I sized down one size, which would have worked. It fit beautifully except for the v-neck. I agree with some of the other reviews that it is was too low cut for that shape! Will be returning.

Beautiful unusual print with vibrant colours. The fabric is lightweight and will be cool for the summer. Glad I got a long length. The style is so flattering, nips in under the bust and skins the hips. I love it.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Broderie Mix Jersey Maxi Dress
details: A dress for when you wake up to blue skies and organise an ad-hoc picnic – the fancy olives kind.
review_description: Gorgeous dress and so excited to receive it- I had read the reviews and ordered 2 sizes smaller ( size 6) . I had looked forward to wearing it with wedges/ sandals and had purchased it to take away on holiday. It is still RIDICULOUSLY ENORMOUS. Really bulky and absolutely huge around the waist. So unflattering and really disappointing. I just don't understand it, it is unbelievably huge and yet the dress is so lovely otherwise and would/ should have been a huge seller. Beyond disappointed . Overpriced and underwhelmed recently with pricing and sizing . What is going on Boden??

I'm a mature lady and was looking for a long white maxi dress to wear on my holiday. There are plenty of these in the high street, but at my age I don't want sections (backless, sideless etc)of the top half of the dress showing my flesh. This one is spot on. I sized down after reading reviews, and it is a perfect fit. I'm 5'2" fairly slim and usually buy a size 10, so I ordered size 8 petite. It's a lovely fit and looks elegant.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden V-Neck Contrast Detail Dress
details: Our above-the-knee printed dress crafted from cotton, and is cut to an easy, semi-fitted shape. Two prints are always better than one, so we've added a contrast pattern to the flattering, angled waistband and deep V-neck. Soft gathers on the shoulders give the short sleeves fluttery volume. There's an invisible zip and side-seam pockets, too.

This dress is so good.

name: Boden Crew Neck Jersey Dress
details: Our crew-neck dress is set for first-outfit-to-reach-for status on warm days. Why? Well, there's the semi-fitted shape, with an above-the-knee skirt. Note the smocking, and the gathers through the skirt – did someone say flattering? Yep, and they also said, "pockets."
review_description: I got this dress in the green print (which is no longer available -- too bad, it's beautiful). I'm 5'2", got the petite, and the dress hits just above my knees. The ruching is below my (smallish) bust, but I could imagine this dress not fitting as well on someone with a large bust. The material is so soft and comfortable, and doesn't wrinkle (it traveled well through 6 plane flights!). It's dressy enough for somewhat dressy occasions, but not too fancy for casual occasions. I wore it with Tevas for casual occasions, but it would look great with espadrilles (which I don't own). I LOVE that it has pockets. LOVE. And unlike in some dresses, the pockets don't create a lumpy look.

So here's the thing, my soon to be 12 year daughter is already 5'6" tall and 115 lbs and is in that odd space where she can't wear mini boden anymore (so sad), but ladies' clothes are either too low cut or just too old looking for her. This dress finally fits our bill for a cute, appropriate cut dress for a pre-teen, perfect for school pictures, church, or the occasional family dinner out! I plan to grab this dress in a few more colors. I purchased her a 2R in the coastal design print for reference and it hits right above knee. And she is crazy about the pockets!

name: Boden V-Neck Jersey Dress
details: When playful meets feminine, this flippy dress is the result. It features a sharp V-neck with soft gathers at the V centre, and thanks to a seam that sits naturally at your waist, the fit is flattering and comfortable (win-win). To finish off, there are stretchy ruffled cuffs that add gentle volume to the short sleeves.

review_description: Sadly this dress was just not for me. I have quite a large chest and the design didn't do me any favours unfortunately

A really, pretty, flattering dress. I already own this in the Larkspur and wanted a second. Unfortunately the Diamond Leaf colours did not quite work with my complexion so reluctantly I sent it back. Beautiful dress though, if these are your colours. Returns dealt with brilliantly by Boden, as always.

details: You. This dress. A strong urge to skip everywhere.
review_description: Very cute, flattering and comfortable. The only thing is the color is pretty different then pictured. Its much darker.

I love this dress and have it in all the colours! It's very flattering for my frame - I am petite with 30EE bust, so its hard to get a good fit all over. The armhole / sleeve is also a perfect cut, not too high or low with nothing 'hanging out' unlike some of the sleeveless offerings. Its super comfy and I've worn it casually and dressed up and get many compliments. I'm sure I will continue to wear it in the winter too with tights and a jacket or cardi on top. Please can we have more colours Boden??

name: Boden Ruched Waist Jersey Midi Dress
details: An elegant midi dress which is perfect for morning meetings AND margaritas? We're in. The chic V-neck and full skirt create a beautiful shape, whilst the fixed wrap and ruching at the waist are supremely flattering. The ballet style sleeves finish at the elbow and the viscose-blend jersey feels soft and smooth (plus, it has a little bit of stretch for comfort).

I've worn it out and had kept looking for a replacement. This was the closest I've found and I'm not disappointed. Lovely fabric, a swishy skirt and flattering neckline.

Brilliant for the more formal occasions. I love it and the bonus is that it has pockets, something which isn't found often in dresses lately. I also bought the navy and ivory patterned option. Love them both.

name: Boden Ruched Bodice Dress
details: For treading that fine line between ‘absolutely smoking’ and not upstaging the bride.
review_description: Lovely dress in pure cotton. Good fit but sadly returned as don't think I'll have the occasion to wear it. Someone else should snap it up though!

I have been ordering several dresses for an upcoming wedding and this 1 is my favorite so far. I got it in blue and I do like the color. The ruching detail is very nice. I initially ordered a 16 based on the measurements but ended up having to go with a 14... might even be able to do a 12. I got it on sale but I don't think I would pay 180 for it... The fabric is nice and light which can be a pro for summer but it just doesn't feel worth 180. Also, if I keep it I will have to get it hemmed for it to actually be a midi dress which is a little surprising because I am 5'7".
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Ruffle Fixed Wrap Jersey Dress
details: There are sleeveless dresses, then there are extra-special sleeveless dresses. Our above-knee jersey style is the latter. The fixed wrap front is trimmed with a row of fluttery ruffles that run along the deep V-neckline and around the armholes. A detachable belt gives the waist defined shape. And, of course, we haven't forgotten the pockets – they're hidden neatly in the side seams.
neck_line: trimmed with a row of fluttery ruffles that run along the deep V-neckline and around the armholes. A detachable belt gives the waist defined shape. And, of course, we haven't forgotten the pockets – they're hidden neatly in the side seams.

review_description: I was excited to receive this dress. Back it goes! The dress fits so well and is super flattering. I am 5'7 1/2 " and ordered my usual 10 L. This dress is so short even in the L length. Anyone taller than I am would have a tough time with the length and constantly pulling it down. I am very disappointed with the direction that Biden is taking in its design and who are their fit models? Clothing does not fit like their classic styles before. No more ordering fir me.
Beautiful light blue colour and lovely neckline. Very easy to wear love it.

name: Boden Jersey Embroidered Midi Dress
details: If 'looking sultry at the market' was a midi dress, it would be this one.
review_description: I've been looking for a boho style white long-sleeved midi dress for ages and it looked like this number was it - the square neck, flared sleeves and embroidery grabbed my attention. I'm normally a 10 in dresses and skirts but saw this was coming up a bit big for other reviewers so I sized down to an 8 PET. When it arrived the size was bang on, but the fit didn't suit me at all. The elasticated waist meant the dress fell really strangely on my curvy frame and wasn't flattering at all. Also uncomfortable as the waist felt scratchy. Sadly had to return it. Please do more dresses in this style Boden but with wider waist bands that fall nicely?
Beautiful dress! It is a bit heavier than I thought. Though, perfect for a cool summer evening. Looking forward to wearing through the rest of summer.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Back Detail Broderie Dress
details: Broderie on sunny days – the sartorial equivalent of ice cream in the park. Please keep off the grass.
review_description: As other reviewers have stated, the back buttons come unfastened with any movement. It's not too tight in the chest either so it has to be the button design. Also, tall sizes are delayed until September, which didn't help me since I needed a dress for a wedding in August. I could almost pass on the length with flats, but the buttons are a shame so I had to return. I'm 36C and ordered 8R and it felt tts. The green color is perfect.

I initially ordered this in my usual size 10, and it was deeply unflattering as it swamped me (I'm only 5ft and would usually go for petite). Reordered in size 8 and it's perfect - I'm delighted! Beautiful high quality material, fully lined, and I love the back detail. Yes the buttons pop undone, but the neckline is large enough to slip it on and off without touching the buttons, so I'm planning on stitching the back closed which will mean this doesn't matter. Now I'm keeping my fingers crossed that the white version comes back in stock in size 8...
occasions: Broderie on sunny days – the sartorial equivalent of ice cream in the park. Please keep off the grass.
Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden V-Neck Jersey Maxi Dress
details: Our elegant maxi dress combines a deep V-neckline with a halter back for a look that's feminine and flattering. The full skirt shape nips in with the detachable self-tie belt then falls down to create a generous floor-sweeping skirt. Thanks to our smooth, drapey jersey fabric, this style scores top marks for sophistication and softness.

Beautiful unusual print with vibrant colours. The fabric is lightweight and will be cool for the summer. Glad I got a long length. The style is so flattering, nips in under the bust and skins the hips. I love it.

It's crazy how many compliments I've received while wearing this dress! Everywhere I've been, I've had so many strangers ask me where I purchased my dress from so I'm super happy! Definitely worth every penny!
Absolutely lovely summer dress. Perfect for going out to dinner, drinks or a concert. The maxi length is very elegant and the dress is made of a comfortable, soft cotton.

name: Boden Embroidered Detail Midi Dress
details: Empire waist, full sleeves, 100% cotton. Easy-breezy. Embroidery adds that extra something-something.
length: Empire waist, full sleeves, 100% cotton. Easy-breezy. Embroidery adds that extra something-something.
review_description: I went down a size - due to reviews - and it is perfect size wise, only con is that I am tall and the pockets seem far too high, but that is a minor problem. More dresses like this please - in long length - they are similar to what I was wearing in the 70's, life goes full circle!

Disappointed in this dress. I love the color and embroidery but Boden cut corners by not putting a zipper in the back or under the arm. As a consequence, the waist has to be big enough to pull on over your head and shoulders. It is a woven fabric, does not stretch. The dress in my usual size 10 fits great in the shoulders and bust but is much, much too big around the waist, just way too much material hanging there like a tent. I could wear it as a caftan but not as a dress. I'd like to see this made a bit more fitted at the waist but that would require a zipper to get it on and off.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

We've crafted it from supersoft breathable cotton to ensure comfort and added seamless capped sleeves for a breezy finish. The  flattering pleats on the front of the knee-length skirt add definition. To confirm its status as a must-have, it has pockets too.

name: Boden Claudia Textured Knitted Dress
details: We've given this dress plenty of extra details. That means an all-over textured stitch pattern for an intricate effect, combined with elegant scalloped edging around the crew neck, cuffs and hem. Knitted from pure combed cotton, this style is soft and naturally breathable. The semi-fitted shape is flattering and feels all-day comfortable, too. For the full knitted look, pair with the matching cardigan.
review_description: Agree with previous reviews. Gorgeous dress, but too thick for hot summers day, need to wear when weather cooler. Does have removable slip underneath, so could potentially wear without as long as choose underwear carefully! Sized down, got 10L, usually 12R in Boden, dress came just above the knee (am 5'4) the regular would have defo been too short for myself.

Looks good in the photos but the material is way too thick and it's boxy on and not flattering. Boden, please bring back all of the Ottoman dresses you used to have! Those were amazing! I'm not sure why you stopped making them but please make them again!!!

name: Boden Strappy Jersey Dress
details: With our strappy jersey dress to hand, you're all set for summer. This is a style that looks simple but is packed with details. First, there are soft gathers all around the wide V-neck to make the fit flattering and comfortable. Then there's an easy shape with plenty of movement. To let you define your waist – or go relaxed – we've added a detachable self-tie belt. A scoop back is the final touch of sunny-day elegance.
neck_line: soft gathers all around the wide V-neck to make the fit flattering and comfortable. Then there's an easy shape with plenty of movement. To let you define your waist – or go relaxed – we've added a detachable self-tie belt. A scoop back is the final touch of sunny-day elegance.
review_description: The colour is a lovely bright orange, but for me 1.65m and age 64 its a bit short - well above my knee with the belt. The neckline is also very plunging - I struggled to hide my bra cups. Sadly returning.

I was a little shocked when the dress arrived because the colour is COMPLETELY different from the photo! It's not red at all but a really bright ORANGE. It's very roomy too, so size down. It is however very comfortable so I'll keep it for wearing at home.

name: Boden Lola Strappy Linen Jumpsuit
details: When we designed this strappy jumpsuit, we took a modern shape and added a pinch (or two) of traditional detailing. It's crafted from breathable linen, so it feels light and airy. A V-neckline, cropped wide legs and thoughtfully placed darts make this a flattering and comfortable choice. At the back, a smocked panel takes care of detail and easy movement all in one.

review_description: Loved this jumpsuit, the quality, the fabric, the style but unfortunately it did not suit my 5ft frame.

I loved this jumpsuit until I tried to zip it up. The zipper quality (I remember when zippers were actually good with steel teeth and didn't ever get stuck)… however the zipper is the worst I've seen in a while- tiny plastic teeth that will surely bend in a few wears. It arrived already sticking at the seam before wearing. My very slim college aged daughter could not zip up without a struggle. Unfortunately this must be returned. A nice jumpsuit ruined by a dollar store quality zipper.

name: Boden Pointelle Knitted Midi Dress
details: Summer's calling. To tell you you look hot. And that you need this knitted midi dress.
review_description: I have about 25 Boden dresses and can say this is one of my favourites. It is so flattering and just skims over those bits you'd rather not emphasise, but isn't at all shapeless.. Hangs beautifully and just the right weight. Makes me feel elegant and stylish. Would definitely buy in other colours.

This is a gorgeous dress but as so often with Boden knitted Dresses it is too short. The proportions aren't right and can't be the same as worn by the model on website. Am so sad to be sending it back because everything else about it is perfect. Perhaps it could be done in a longer length also.

details: Strapless makes a comeback. And this time, it's got smocking. We added optional straps if that's your thing, too.
review_description: I went with the Firecracker color, looks same as pictured - happy, fresh combo of orange/white. Very impressed with a smart design: good amount of volume to hide imperfections, but not too much as some other dresses on the market; pockets, removable, adjustable thin straps. Went with my usual size for Boden dresses, very happy with the fit. For reference: 5'6" 127lbs 34A, size 4. Thank you, Boden!

This is really the first time I have bought a dress and was horrified when it arrived. The colours looked nothing like the colours online more brown and the pink was very pronounced . Had to go straight back

name: Boden Embroidered Cotton Dress
details: Every inch of this dress screams "summer". That'll be the embroidered cotton.
review_description: The color and embroidery on the dress are gorgeous , but the fit is disappointing. Despite the vibrant appearance, it feels frumpy. Too big in the chest and "poofs" unnaturally once tied at the waist. I'm keeping it, but only for super casual events or running errands. . Would not recommend for anything more formal due to un flattering fit.

I just received this dress. I had to order it a size smaller than I normally wear but it fit fine. It runs a little big. Really nice quality embroidery. I did not realize it was lined but this makes it substantial enough to wear to work. I also had to get tall, but this is fine as it hits just below the knee, again, good for work. I got lots of compliments when I wore it today.

details: Whether layering up to scale snowy mountains or crossing sunny Saharas, quality basics like this jersey T-shirt are a must. Made from supersoft 100% cotton, it's ready for all adventures – and for the washing machine.
review_description: As usual another great basic t shirt for boys. Good fit and material

My picky son loves these. I purchase the shirts with designs/stitching here and he prefers these basic ones because they're not "itchy". I keep coming back for more every year. I also love that they're 100% cotton. My petite son who is almost 8 wears the 8/9 size just fine.

name: Boden GITD Underwater T-shirt
details: It's time for an underwater adventure. Enter our cotton appliqué T-shirt. It has a comfortable, ribbed crew neck and neat double-stitching at the cuffs of the shorts sleeves. Choose between a brightly coloured swordfish, a squid and whale playing together or the view from the window of a deep-sea submarine. name: Boden Jersey One Shoulder Romper
details: When summer comes around, our printed playsuit is ready and waiting. It's a striking one-shouldered design with a stretchy ruffled neckline. To make the fit secure, we've popped a slim adjustable strap on the other side (in a contrasting colour, of course). A drawstring elasticated waist makes everything from running to cartwheeling easy. And because there's no such thing as too many frills, we've added some around the hems.

review_description: I love the thickness of the knit. Maybe not great for super hot weather but works for where we live. My daughter is between an 8 and 9 so went for the 9-10 and glad I did. The pink strap is too long, as other reviewers say. I hemmed it and that solved the problem. You could remove it entirely and it wouldn't affect the wearability - it's pretty much just there for looks. Worth it at the sale price, but not full price.
My daughter loves this little playsuit, great for playing in the park and garden and looked super cute and colourful for her 7th birthday party.

details: With its colourful rainbow pattern and striking asymmetric neckline, our swimsuit is a real ray of sunshine. You'll find a wide strap on one side, balanced by a thin strap on the other. That makes for a secure and comfortable fit, which is able to stand up to even the most energetic of splashing.
neck_line: With its colourful rainbow pattern and striking asymmetric neckline, our swimsuit is a real ray of sunshine. You'll find a wide strap on one
review_description: Such a cute swimsuit. We sized up because of reviews and it fit well!

I wanted to get a higher quality swimsuit that would last my daughter all summer and hold up to pool and beach rough-housing. Sadly this didn't fit the bill. The red spaghetti strap was already a bit looser on her than the yellow side, but I thought it would be fine. Sadly it DID NOT hold up to a 3 year old style of dressing (she pulls it on by the straps like all young kids). The red strap is now INCHES longer than the other side and she doesn't want to wear it because it is uncomfortable and falls down. It's cute, but just not durable.

review_description: Beautiful little gilet, looks exactly like in the photo and is reversible which is great

When she was about 1 hour old she was wrapped in a soft white towel and a video was done of her stroking it i want to see if she does the same with the gilot ,I have not seen her for a bit due to Covid ,Cant wait to find out,
style: For the cosiest of cuddles, wrap up your little one in our soft fleecy gilet. The faux-fur design is decorated with a sweet print on the inside.

name: Boden Frill Sleeve Appliqué Dress
details: We've gone bold with this pure cotton dress. A huge elephant strides out from the front – look closer to see a playful baby peeping out from behind. They're crafted from textured appliqué and feature colour-popping embroidered and tasselled details (these are some stylish animals). Thanks to its A-line shape, this is a comfortable choice. Ruffly cap sleeves are a fluttery finishing touch.
length: behind. They're crafted from textured appliqué and feature colour-popping embroidered and tasselled details (these are some stylish animals). Thanks to its A-line shape, this is a comfortable choice. Ruffly cap sleeves are a fluttery finishing touch.
review_description: Absolutely beautiful. Everything I by from Boden is stylish and made with the highest quality. Love it!

One of the best girls' dresses in the line up. Beautiful elephant design and vibrant colors make this a perfect choice. Thankfully, they've gotten rid of the stiff button at the back of the neck as well; this has long been the least favorite detail of far too many boden designs. While the photo online shows the tiny, stiff neck button, the dress that arrived simply fit over the head, no buttoning required. Absolutely love this dress!

name: Boden Superstretch Skinny Jeans
details: These might look like regular skinny jeans but they're actually a little bit special. They're our most skinny fit, but the fabric is extra-stretchy so they are comfortable and durable. This drainpipe style is even flexible enough to show off your trickiest gymnastic moves.
review_description: These are super comfy, washes and wears well too

Great quality denim as expected from Boden. However the Light Vintage is not as pictured. No ombre distressed raw edge at bottom, just plain ordinary hem. Fine by me, however not as expected. Also, I wish I ordered a size up since the 12 is a perfect fit on my slim 12 year old with no room to grow.

details: Crafted from sturdy denim, these jeans deserve pride of place in Mini explorers' wardrobes. They're designed in a relaxed fit for tip-top comfort and have turn-up cuffs to create the perfect length. Will classic denim or multi-coloured embroidered stars be the winner?

Super comfy relaxed fit jeans. Adjustable waist band means that my tall skinny child fits them great. Really, really good quality as well. So nice to have girls jeans that have pockets and aren't jeggings

name: Boden Adventure-flex Slim Fit Jeans
details: These slim-fit jeans are full of surprises. Find a secret print inside the waistband and handy pockets built for collecting treasures. These are fitted around the hips and slim on the leg and are ready for anything, from tree-climbing and playing tag to lunch with the grown-ups. We know where we'd rather be.
review_description: We were a bit disappointed with the fit of these - my daughter has previously had (and loved) the jeggings and we hoped these would be a similar fit, but unfortunately they just didn't look right at all - baggy on the legs but not enough stretch when she sat down. We did like the style and the quality seemed good, hence 3 stars. We returned them though.

My daughter has become somewhat picky when it comes to jeans and these are hands down her absolute favorite! We ordered a second pair so she always has one pair ready to wear! Super comfy, great quality and they look nice. Mom and daughter are both happy!

name: Boden Flared Jeans
details: There's a little bit of disco in every step of these flared jeans – in three combinations of dip dye, each groovier than the last.
review_description: My daughter loves the retro, cool design of these. For fit - She is quite thin, usually wearing a 6/7 or 7/8 in leggings, and the 7 fit her pretty well - a little loose, but I didn't tighten the waist at all, and it can be adjusted. She loves them so much that she wore them today, even though it's 90+ degrees!
style: There's a little bit of disco in every step of these flared jeans – in three combinations of dip dye, each groovier than the last.

name: Boden Embroidered Holiday Trousers
details: Sun-soaked days are complete when these holiday trousers make an appearance. The pure linen fabric is all about coolness, while the elasticated drawcord waist guarantees a comfortable fit. Curved hems create a casual feel and there's plenty of room for essentials in the four pockets – find big ones on the front and little ones at the back. Choose from a selection of patterns, all finished with colourful embroidery.
review_description: These trousers (rainbow stripe) are just gorgeous! So lightweight and comfortable yet so cute. My 9 year old is in age 8 which fit her tall slim frame perfectly and they graze her ankles which I really like. 100% recommend
These pants are so cute and comfortable! Perfect for light weight pants for summer. We bought the Blue Wave Flowers first and went back and got the Ivory/Coastal stripes.

name: Boden Crochet Trim Jersey Maxi Dress
details: You. This dress. An obnoxiously large sun hat. All that's missing is a yacht to charter.
review_description: Dress was exactly as described. As I am small in height I asked for petite, which I received. Still slightly too long. Not a problem will have it shortened. It would be an idea to add length to assist customers

I absolutely love this dress! I wore it for a spa weekend away and got so many compliments. The cut is flattering and the style looks almost Grecian. It looks just as good over a bikini as it does dressed up for the evening. The jersey feels beautifully soft and swishy around my legs.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Ruffle Printed Mini Dress
details: You. This dress. A strong urge to skip everywhere.
review_description: Very cute, flattering and comfortable. The only thing is the color is pretty different then pictured. Its much darker.

I love this dress and have it in all the colours! It's very flattering for my frame - I am petite with 30EE bust, so its hard to get a good fit all over. The armhole / sleeve is also a perfect cut, not too high or low with nothing 'hanging out' unlike some of the sleeveless offerings. Its super comfy and I've worn it casually and dressed up and get many compliments. I'm sure I will continue to wear it in the winter too with tights and a jacket or cardi on top. Please can we have more colours Boden??
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Jersey Midi Tea Dress
details: From picnic to party, our multi-tasking tea dress has all occasions covered. The fabric is soft, smooth, drapey and comfortable, while the bold print is sure to spark many a conversation. Thanks to intricate smocking at the shoulders and light fluttery sleeves, this style has a romantic feel. The semi-fitted shape, empire waist and low V-neckline join forces to create a flattering finish.

name: Boden Relaxed Linen Tiered Dress
details: Looking for a head-turning dress that's ultra-comfortable? You've found it. This summery style's three-quarter fluted sleeves have impact, while the relaxed fit and tiered skirt guarantee a floaty feel. We've added a flattering V-neck, too, along with practical side pockets. Both cool and breathable, the linen fabric is hardwearing and ready for endless sunny-day wear.
neck_line: the relaxed fit and tiered skirt guarantee a floaty feel. We've added a flattering V-neck, too, along with practical side pockets. Both cool and breathable, the linen fabric is hardwearing and ready for endless sunny-day wear.
length: Looking for a head-turning dress that's ultra-comfortable? You've found it. This summery style's three-quarter fluted sleeves have impact, while
review_description: I had to act quickly on this one. I could see the shrimp dress was selling fast. While it cost a lot more than I'd have liked to pay for a casual dress, once it arrived any concerns I had disappeared. I ordered the 12L and I'm 175cms tall and it hits right at the bottom of my knee. No tightness or gaping across the bust and it kindly glides over my ample bottom and thighs. I wear slips underneath my unlined dresses to give a smoother outline and will do the same with this dress. The only issue I can see is that it will require ironing every wear and this might wear thin after a while, especially if I'm on holiday. Apart from this, it's a well designed dress and I'm glad I dared to buy something a little different.

Unlike a lot of the other reviews I was happy with my usual size for a comfy, relaxed fit. The print really is super fun and looks just as good in real life as it does in the model shots. As always, thank you for pockets!!!

name: Boden Sienna Jersey Maxi Dress
details: Floor-sweeping and flowing, there's a reason the maxi dress is a timeless go-to. This elegant design features a V-neckline at the front which is mirrored on the back, as well as an effortlessly flattering ruched waistband. We've crafted it from a drapey viscose-blend jersey that feels soft and smooth, and has a little bit of stretch for comfort.

length: Floor-sweeping and flowing, there's a reason the maxi dress is a timeless go-to. This elegant design features a V-neckline at the front which is
review_description: Hands down my favorite dress Boden makes. I hope they never stop making this! At 5' 2" I'm so grateful for a maxi dress that comes in petite sizes! Runs true to size. I have multiple patterns and always receive compliments when I wear them. Easy to throw on and go while still looking put together.

Lovely dress, colour and pattern true to pic. I had to size up in this one though, too tight across the bust and waist in my usual size 12. I am 5'10 so this becomes more of a long midi than a maxi, but looks really nice with flip flops or slightly dressier with espadrilles for summer.
occasions: Flattering fitted shape through bust and waist with a flared skirt
style: Flattering fitted shape through bust and waist with a flared skirt

name: Boden Lola Strappy Linen Jumpsuit
details: When we designed this strappy jumpsuit, we took a modern shape and added a pinch (or two) of traditional detailing. It's crafted from breathable linen, so it feels light and airy. A V-neckline, cropped wide legs and thoughtfully placed darts make this a flattering and comfortable choice. At the back, a smocked panel takes care of detail and easy movement all in one.
neck_line: linen, so it feels light and airy. A V-neckline, cropped wide legs and thoughtfully placed darts make this a flattering and comfortable choice. At the back, a smocked panel takes care of detail and easy movement all in one.

review_description: Loved this jumpsuit, the quality, the fabric, the style but unfortunately it did not suit my 5ft frame.

I loved this jumpsuit until I tried to zip it up. The zipper quality (I remember when zippers were actually good with steel teeth and didn't ever get stuck)… however the zipper is the worst I've seen in a while- tiny plastic teeth that will surely bend in a few wears. It arrived already sticking at the seam before wearing. My very slim college aged daughter could not zip up without a struggle. Unfortunately this must be returned. A nice jumpsuit ruined by a dollar store quality zipper.

name: Boden Girlfriend Jeans
details: Girlfriends rule the denim roost these days, and they know how to deliver a killer combo of comfort and coolness. These jeans take a hint-of-stretch fabric and a relaxed fit, then throw in a mid-rise waist and a choice of washes. The hems are just begging to be rolled up (with a couldn't-care-less attitude, obviously).
length: Fitted on your waist, tapered down to your ankles
review_description: Love these jeans - different and goes with anything.

I bought these jeans in the sale and wasn't sure how they would fit, particularly as I live in tight skinny jeans. They were perfect and just the right amount of fabric. Didn't cling to my legs but enough to be comfortable and not baggy looking (I'm 5'5" and size 14). The colour was great for me, as again I live in black, so the grey was a pleasant change. Perfect around the waist, leg, ankle width and rise. Did go back for a look at the dark indigo, and plan to purchase very soon!

name: Boden Crinkle Tapered Trousers
details: Packing for a mini-break? Don't leave home without these holiday-ready trousers. Their semi-fitted mid-rise fit tapers to deep elasticated cuffs at the ankles, creating a flattering effect. A stretchy waistband, complete with a tasselled drawcord, has comfort more than covered. This colourful printed pair is wear-on-repeat-ready, thanks to the lightweight and drapey crinkle fabric.

name: Boden Levanzo Ruched Halter Swimsuit
details: It supports. It flatters. The only thing Levanzo can't do is teach you how to dive.
neck_line: Halterneck ties
review_description: I bought the ruched halter swimsuit from Boden in 2018 and loved it! It was less of a wrap style and just a halter with gathered fabric at the belly. I've gained a bit of weight since then and the comments recommended to size up so I went from a 6 to a 12. Unfortunately I think it's a bit too big and the wrap style is less flattering- it feels like there are too many layers of fabric on the belly and I'm always tugging at it to get it to sit right. There is also not much support and no ruching in the lower belly where I need it with my mummy tummy. So if your hoping for the ruched style to distract from your belly I'm afraid this is not it.
The colours are gorgeous, I love the longer length that boden offers - the only swimming costumes I buy!
occasions: Swimwear

name: Boden Levanzo Ruched Halter Swimsuit
details: It supports. It flatters. The only thing Levanzo can't do is teach you how to dive.
neck_line: Halterneck ties
review_description: I bought the ruched halter swimsuit from Boden in 2018 and loved it! It was less of a wrap style and just a halter with gathered fabric at the belly. I've gained a bit of weight since then and the comments recommended to size up so I went from a 6 to a 12. Unfortunately I think it's a bit too big and the wrap style is less flattering- it feels like there are too many layers of fabric on the belly and I'm always tugging at it to get it to sit right. There is also not much support and no ruching in the lower belly where I need it with my mummy tummy. So if your hoping for the ruched style to distract from your belly I'm afraid this is not it.
The colours are gorgeous, I love the longer length that boden offers - the only swimming costumes I buy!
occasions: Swimwear

length: Slinky straps, flattering V-neck and a torso-covering cut: this tankini top understood the assignment.
review_description: I love the style and the colors and pattern. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because once it's on it's great, but it is extremely hard to get on. Definitely order a size up from your usual swimsuit size.

I've lived in this during the uk mini heatwave. Love that with the bottoms it looks like a swimsuit but is really a top, more practical for loo trips ! Also not as revealing as a full bikini .Has definitely converted me to tankinis!

review_description: Sent this top back as the white lining inside the bust area was showing on the outside. I would have kept trying to straighten it whilst wearing so sent it back with the matching bottoms.

I bought this with the bikini shorts as a surprise for my niece and she was over the moon happy with it! Such a fun print, and even with the light colored background there is no see-through. She was all smiles wearing it the very next day!
occasions: Swimwear

name: Boden Positano Hotchpotch Swimsuit
details: Both stylish and supportive, this swimsuit is the catch of the day. The confidence-boosting fixed cups are designed to keep you feeling secure, while our innovative power-mesh lining smooths your shape. We've kept things flattering and fun with contrast detailing on the crossed halter-neck and defined waistband.
neck_line: while our innovative power-mesh lining smooths your shape. We've kept things flattering and fun with contrast detailing on the crossed halter-neck and defined waistband.
review_description: Purchased this swim suit for an upcoming vacation. Other reviewers mentioned it ran small but I found it to be true to size, easy to get on and off and didn't expose too much butt. Love the flattering pattern and unique cross-strap neckline.

Looked sensational but I found it really difficult to get on especially when damp or sweaty. The inner lining and outer got mismatched as I pulled it on . The buckle clips holding straps got twisted and uncomfortable. I despaired on holiday and cut the lining out. But in the end binned it at the end of my trip

name: Boden Porto Swimsuit
details: Printed, V-neck, properly sculpting. The pool's waiting.
neck_line: Printed, V-neck, properly sculpting. The pool's waiting.
review_description: So exciting! This is the first one piece suit I've ever worn thats comfortable! Good quality, pretty colors, stays put. I'm 6ft 150 lbs purchased Size 8 long. Oh and it came surprisingly fast. Side note, I have the sane style 2 piece suit that I also love.
So happy with it. I got the long version which is needed as I'm 5'9 and have already had lots of compliments.
occasions: Swimwear

name: Boden Portofino Cup-size Swimsuit
details: This swimsuit is underwired and cup-sized for a fit you can feel confident in, with adjustable and removable straps, with sculpted lining for support, without compromising on comfort. A contrast waistband and clever side panels make it universally flattering. To spoil you for choice, we've crafted it in a range of colourways and prints. Warning: this might be a tricky decision.
review_description: Very flattering. I am an athletically built 5"8, 160 lbs. ordered 38C. It's a little lose on the bottom but it doesn't bother me enough to return

I love the color combo and the vintage feel of the suit. The straps are removable which I did not realize. I might end up criss crossing the straps in the back if it doesn't stay up with in the water. This suit has a control like netting inside making it a little hard to put on but looks great once on (I have one from a previous season that is the same). Also has about 3 in of boning on the sides giving it a bra like feel. If you have tactile issue, you may not like this suit (the netting and boning make it a little rough feeling). This one does have silicone like trim on the tops of the cups on the inside, I assume due to the removable straps to keep it up when taken off, which makes this suit a little less comfortable. Probably will not be a suit I will wear for the sole purpose of swimming but it will look great poolside when hanging out with friends.
occasions: This swimsuit is underwired and cup-sized for a fit you can feel confident in, with adjustable and removable straps, with sculpted lining for

The polyester lining and nylon are made from 100% recycled materials, so it's a planet-friendly choice. review_description: This top has lovely sleeves and I would agree with other reviews that it is fairly shapeless. Depending what you wear it with, it could work well. This was big, baggy and shapeless I'm afraid. Even if I'd sized down it would still have been shapeless and boxy - too short in the body, too wide everywhere else. A miss, sadly.

name: Boden Broderie Sleeve Linen T-Shirt
details: We thought the classic T-shirt could do with a little extra something, which is how our crew-neck top came about. The body has a comfortable semi-fitted shape and is crafted from the warm-weather favourite that's – you guessed it – pure, breathable linen. By contrast, the sleeves are made from lightweight cotton. They feature textured broderie detailing and are nipped in by ruffly cuffs to give them a touch of puff.

name: Boden Girlfriend Jeans
details: Girlfriends rule the denim roost these days, and they know how to deliver a killer combo of comfort and coolness. These jeans take a hint-of-stretch fabric and a relaxed fit, then throw in a mid-rise waist and a choice of washes. The hems are just begging to be rolled up (with a couldn't-care-less attitude, obviously).
length: Fitted on your waist, tapered down to your ankles
review_description: Love these jeans - different and goes with anything.

I bought these jeans in the sale and wasn't sure how they would fit, particularly as I live in tight skinny jeans. They were perfect and just the right amount of fabric. Didn't cling to my legs but enough to be comfortable and not baggy looking (I'm 5'5" and size 14). The colour was great for me, as again I live in black, so the grey was a pleasant change. Perfect around the waist, leg, ankle width and rise. Did go back for a look at the dark indigo, and plan to purchase very soon!

details: If you loved our Soho Skinny Jeans, then these are set to become your new everyday skinnies. With a mid-rise waist and a super-slender fit, they are really flattering. Crafted from gloriously soft and stretchy denim, they're oh-so-comfortable and available in a range of hues or classic black.
length: Skinny right down to your ankles
review_description: Loved the quality but the shape was wrong. They wrinkled over the upper leg so definitely not skinny. The shape had altered over the past couple of years. Why change a good design?

I am SO impressed by these. They are quite possibly the best pair of jeans I have ever owned. The fabric is a heavy weight and the standard of quality is evident from the moment of taking them out of the packet. I'm 5ft3 and a size 14 so ordered the 14P and they are perfect. So flattering and they hold their shape. Not too skinny, kind of a hybrid between a skinny and a mom. I just love them and got them in the sale, otherwise I'd never have tried them. Wish I'd discovered Boden sooner!

review_description: I went down a size - due to reviews - and it is perfect size wise, only con is that I am tall and the pockets seem far too high, but that is a minor problem. More dresses like this please - in long length - they are similar to what I was wearing in the 70's, life goes full circle!

Disappointed in this dress. I love the color and embroidery but Boden cut corners by not putting a zipper in the back or under the arm. As a consequence, the waist has to be big enough to pull on over your head and shoulders. It is a woven fabric, does not stretch. The dress in my usual size 10 fits great in the shoulders and bust but is much, much too big around the waist, just way too much material hanging there like a tent. I could wear it as a caftan but not as a dress. I'd like to see this made a bit more fitted at the waist but that would require a zipper to get it on and off.

There are plenty of these in the high street, but at my age I don't want sections (backless, sideless etc)of the top half of the dress showing my flesh. This one is spot on. I sized down after reading reviews, and it is a perfect fit. I'm 5'2" fairly slim and usually buy a size 10, so I ordered size 8 petite. It's a lovely fit and looks elegant.

name: Boden Relaxed Linen Tiered Dress
details: Looking for a head-turning dress that's ultra-comfortable? You've found it. This summery style's three-quarter fluted sleeves have impact, while the relaxed fit and tiered skirt guarantee a floaty feel. We've added a flattering V-neck, too, along with practical side pockets. Both cool and breathable, the linen fabric is hardwearing and ready for endless sunny-day wear.
neck_line: the relaxed fit and tiered skirt guarantee a floaty feel. We've added a flattering V-neck, too, along with practical side pockets. Both cool and breathable, the linen fabric is hardwearing and ready for endless sunny-day wear.
length: Looking for a head-turning dress that's ultra-comfortable? You've found it. This summery style's three-quarter fluted sleeves have impact, while
review_description: I had to act quickly on this one. I could see the shrimp dress was selling fast. While it cost a lot more than I'd have liked to pay for a casual dress, once it arrived any concerns I had disappeared. I ordered the 12L and I'm 175cms tall and it hits right at the bottom of my knee. No tightness or gaping across the bust and it kindly glides over my ample bottom and thighs. I wear slips underneath my unlined dresses to give a smoother outline and will do the same with this dress. The only issue I can see is that it will require ironing every wear and this might wear thin after a while, especially if I'm on holiday. Apart from this, it's a well designed dress and I'm glad I dared to buy something a little different.

Unlike a lot of the other reviews I was happy with my usual size for a comfy, relaxed fit. The print really is super fun and looks just as good in real life as it does in the model shots. As always, thank you for pockets!!!

Not sure where to start with this - lovely pattern but that's where it end. Its thin cheap looking cotton , absolutely massive, deeply unflattering I am sure for most people and one of most badly designed pieces I have ever bought from Boden. As I don't have a boat that needs a sail , I will be sending back. Embarrassing and poor.

name: Boden Broderie Mix Jersey Maxi Dress
details: A dress for when you wake up to blue skies and organise an ad-hoc picnic – the fancy olives kind.
review_description: Gorgeous dress and so excited to receive it- I had read the reviews and ordered 2 sizes smaller ( size 6) . I had looked forward to wearing it with wedges/ sandals and had purchased it to take away on holiday. It is still RIDICULOUSLY ENORMOUS. Really bulky and absolutely huge around the waist. So unflattering and really disappointing. I just don't understand it, it is unbelievably huge and yet the dress is so lovely otherwise and would/ should have been a huge seller. Beyond disappointed . Overpriced and underwhelmed recently with pricing and sizing . What is going on Boden??

name: Boden Knitted Lace Maxi Dress
details: Knit hot. Or, knits for when it's hot.
review_description: Beautiful dress, loved the colour. But I wanted a maxi dress, not a midi. I am 5ft10 and ordered the regular as there was no tall version of the dress. This has previously worked fine with other Boden maxi dresses. However, this dress ends at mid calf on me, so I have had to send it back. A real shame, as had it been a few inches longer, it would have been perfect.

I'm 5ft 1 and I bought the petite length. I feel the photography is slightly misleading as it implies the dress comes up quite high, with enough coverage up top to make it suitable for work. But in fact, the straps are about two inches too long for me, thereby creating a very low neckline. Admittedly this gives me a fabulous cleavage, but it's definitely not office-appropriate, especially for those of us with larger cup sizes. I was debating whether to shorten the straps or not, but I think I'm going to leave them as they are and keep the dress for going to the park on hot days. It's a really good quality fabric with a good weight, not flimsy, with plenty of stretch so it still fits even if you're a larger size on your bottom half.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Freya Tie Back Maxi Dress
details: Holiday packing hack: this maxi dress. Made from crinkle viscose, it'll arrive the other side looking just as good.
length: Holiday packing hack: this maxi dress. Made from crinkle viscose, it'll arrive the other side looking just as good.
review_description: I put on this lovely dress and my man was so impressed he said I deserved a kiss !!! Fantastic dress, cool, comfortable and really stylish.

This dress looks so cute on. It's a tad more billowy in the skirt than I'd like, but that's really just nit-picking. The top fits perfect. I'm 5'3 128lbs and the 4p fits well. Very comfortable and cool for hot summer days. No issues with bra showing with tie in back.

Fabulous!! Its so easy to get on and off which I absolutely love!! The material is great and I love the style. I am 5'3 ordered a 8P and it is a great length and fit. Literally put it straight on and cant wait to wear it out now.

name: Boden Girlfriend Jeans
details: Girlfriends rule the denim roost these days, and they know how to deliver a killer combo of comfort and coolness. These jeans take a hint-of-stretch fabric and a relaxed fit, then throw in a mid-rise waist and a choice of washes. The hems are just begging to be rolled up (with a couldn't-care-less attitude, obviously).
length: Fitted on your waist, tapered down to your ankles
review_description: Love these jeans - different and goes with anything.

I bought these jeans in the sale and wasn't sure how they would fit, particularly as I live in tight skinny jeans. They were perfect and just the right amount of fabric. Didn't cling to my legs but enough to be comfortable and not baggy looking (I'm 5'5" and size 14). The colour was great for me, as again I live in black, so the grey was a pleasant change. Perfect around the waist, leg, ankle width and rise. Did go back for a look at the dark indigo, and plan to purchase very soon!

name: Boden Skinny Jeans
details: If you loved our Soho Skinny Jeans, then these are set to become your new everyday skinnies. With a mid-rise waist and a super-slender fit, they are really flattering. Crafted from gloriously soft and stretchy denim, they're oh-so-comfortable and available in a range of hues or classic black.
length: Skinny right down to your ankles
review_description: Loved the quality but the shape was wrong. They wrinkled over the upper leg so definitely not skinny. The shape had altered over the past couple of years. Why change a good design?

I am SO impressed by these. They are quite possibly the best pair of jeans I have ever owned. The fabric is a heavy weight and the standard of quality is evident from the moment of taking them out of the packet. I'm 5ft3 and a size 14 so ordered the 14P and they are perfect. So flattering and they hold their shape. Not too skinny, kind of a hybrid between a skinny and a mom. I just love them and got them in the sale, otherwise I'd never have tried them. Wish I'd discovered Boden sooner!

details: Flattering? Check. Comfortable? That, too. This full-length jersey skirt is the ultimate get-up-and-look-fab piece. There’s shirring at the waist to easily pull it on, and pockets hidden in the side seams. That soft, drapey fabric gives you plenty of movement, too.
length: Flattering? Check. Comfortable? That, too. This full-length jersey skirt is the ultimate get-up-and-look-fab piece. There’s shirring at the waist
review_description: I really love this skirt except the waist is not at all flattering on me, and in fact makes my waist look thicker. So I'm returning it. If the waist was more streamlined I would have kept this and worn it a lot, as it seems very versatile. This may not be a problem for folks with slimmer waists, so definitely try this if you like the style.
