review_description: Who doesn't need and want a classic white top for summer. I have bought two of these tops. They are so comfortable and have the right amount of stretch to them. It just says "SUMMER".

I have bought several of these tops in the past in the same size small and have never had a problem with the fit. This one was way too long which meant I would always have to wear it tucked in. The pink colour was lovely but I've decided to send it back.

review_description: It's so soft and comfy. Love the design as well. It's got a warmer layer underneath so I use it for colder days.

name: Boden Cropped Cotton Top
details: Say hello to this sunny-day and warm-evening winner. It's crafted from soft cotton, so it's lightweight and naturally breathable. The shape is fitted and softly gathered, with elasticated bands at the top and bottom, for a secure feel and flattering look. The straps are adjustable too.
length: fitted and softly gathered, with elasticated bands at the top and bottom, for a secure feel and flattering look. The straps are adjustable too.
review_description: I got this top to match with the skirt, for a dinner night on my bachelorette, and I certainly will wear this set way beyond this year/the wedding. It is so flattering, I can't wait to wear this. I got size 6, and I'm 34'D. Fits perfectly!

I originally bought the Bluebell maxi skirt - which is gorgeous - and then immediately regretted not buying the matching cropped top which was sold out in my size 8 for months and months. I persevered and even got one which was subsequently cancelled as the account credit I thought I had I didn't and in getting it sorted it went back out of stock. FINALLY it appeared and I snapped it up. The fit is great as I did worry that it might just be too short and also too wide across the body as the style looks a bit 'puffy'. Bearing in mind that I am 60 years young it was a bit of a risk but I've no wrinkles to be concerned about on my torso so feel I can get away with it as it's not too cropped on me. Got it in the sale too so one very happy pensioner 🙂

name: Boden Square Neck Linen Top
details: Our throw-on-and-go breathable linen summer top might seem simple, but it's packed with detail. The square neckline has a modern look and is emphasised by a deep panel (your choice of embroidered or plain) running all the way around it. Short puffed sleeves – gathered at the shoulders and lined to create volume – are nipped in neatly by smooth stretchy cuffs. For all-day coolness, the body is relaxed and comfortable (that's what we call a win-win).

review_description: Shame about square back - made it very drafty 🤣 Perfect for a heatwave tho! I'm always hunting for good tops for work and this didn't suit. Please can we have more cotton tops with swing jersey bodices, pretty please Boden, as my originals all now have holes in! 😭
This top goes with everything and looks fantastic and is very different.

name: Boden Smocked Waist Co-ord Top
details: Great print. Great shape. But the best bit? It works just as well with the matching skirt as it does with other players in your wardrobe.
review_description: I never thought I could wear this as I'm not showing my mommy of 3 tummy to the world …. But the pants come up so high it's actually quite do able and flattering! I love the outfit with the pants and can dress it way up , but could also wear over a swimsuit for a fancy beach/ pool day.
Lovely top, its not too short in body for me as I also bought the skirt to go with it, and it just sits on the waste band which is fine for me. The colour and the design is wonderful I just love it

name: Boden Skinny Jeans
details: If you loved our Soho Skinny Jeans, then these are set to become your new everyday skinnies. With a mid-rise waist and a super-slender fit, they are really flattering. Crafted from gloriously soft and stretchy denim, they're oh-so-comfortable and available in a range of hues or classic black.
length: Skinny right down to your ankles
review_description: Loved the quality but the shape was wrong. They wrinkled over the upper leg so definitely not skinny. The shape had altered over the past couple of years. Why change a good design?

I am SO impressed by these. They are quite possibly the best pair of jeans I have ever owned. The fabric is a heavy weight and the standard of quality is evident from the moment of taking them out of the packet. I'm 5ft3 and a size 14 so ordered the 14P and they are perfect. So flattering and they hold their shape. Not too skinny, kind of a hybrid between a skinny and a mom. I just love them and got them in the sale, otherwise I'd never have tried them. Wish I'd discovered Boden sooner!

name: Boden Relaxed Straight Jeans
details: So you look laid-back and oh-so-easygoing in our relaxed straight-leg jeans. But on close inspection, there's more to them than first meets the eye. Take the concealed button fly. Or the just-right ankle crop. And what about the effortlessly cool raw hems? Whether you go for classic black or the vintage wash you can rest assured that we've thought of all the little details.

review_description: I can't believe how much I like these jeans. My daughter picked the cherry pattern and they are subtle , high quality, adorable, youthful jeans. They do run a bit small in my opinion but they are so flattering. I sincerely thank you for the sales and Birthday voucher, you make stylish clothing doable. Thank you so much
Absolutely love the fit of these jeans!!!

name: Boden Girlfriend Jeans
details: Girlfriends rule the denim roost these days, and they know how to deliver a killer combo of comfort and coolness. These jeans take a hint-of-stretch fabric and a relaxed fit, then throw in a mid-rise waist and a choice of washes. The hems are just begging to be rolled up (with a couldn't-care-less attitude, obviously).
length: Fitted on your waist, tapered down to your ankles
review_description: Love these jeans - different and goes with anything.

review_description: Lovely quality needle cord. Comfortable and versatile- I would recommend

I ordered these slim black cords and picked size 10, the same size as I'd bought before, only longer as the previous pair were too short. The new pair was far too big and about 6 inches longer - which was too much. Disappointed. I understand that women are 'bigger' now than they used to be but it's frustrating to find that one can no longer trust the sizing to reflect the correct measurements.

name: Boden Slim Leg Chinos
details: Our classic chinos are the essential building blocks for your smart-casual looks – and we've made them even better this time around. They're cut from a new breathable cotton blend – that has a four-way stretch (that means it moves with your body) – with a slim fit throughout the thigh and hem, that's cut closer around the hip and seat. We've added side, coin and back pockets to be sure there's a place for everything. All you have to do is decide which versatile colour to choose.
review_description: These are a great pair of pants. The fabric is nice quality and they fit nicely. My husband didn't want to bother hemming them as they were many inches too long on him (he needs a 28 or 30 inseam) and returned them for that reason. But I would love to see these come in at least a 30" inseam and will purchase if they do.
Bought for my partner. He returned them as the slim leg was a bit too slim. So he's going to order the straight leg as they were such good quality !

name: Boden Classic Fit Moleskin Blazer
details: When there's an excuse for a tailored look, turn to our refined blazer. It's crafted from brushed cotton with a washed finish that makes it supersoft. For practicality, we've added buttoned cuffs, along with two large front pockets, a smaller chest pocket and internal compartments (handy, right?). Cue vibrant binding on the inside and a printed panel at the inner neck to add that final dash of colour.

name: Boden Dulwich Blazer
details: Classic styling joins forces with a contemporary shape in this smart, everyday blazer. Crafted from lightweight pure cotton, the soft fabric has an eye-catching texture, while the contrast-colour lining features one of our in-house-designed prints. Look out for refined details like the mock-horn buttons.
review_description: Bought this on my husband's behalf. He wore it to a wedding where the dress code was smart casual. Teamed it with a pale blue shirt and chinos. Looked good!
This blazer is just what I was looking for. It's sharp and stylish in an understated way and not overly formal. It's a little warmer than the average blazer, but I still love it.

Tailored fit

name: Boden Slim Leg Jeans
details: What could possibly be the basis for all casual outfits? Time to introduce this pair of flattering, slim-leg jeans. They're crafted from a new sustainable fabric as the cotton is made from up to 20% recycled materials. They also have elastane for stretch and a new, improved fit that feels as good as it looks. With planet friendliness in mind, this style's button and zip are both made with recycled metal and we've used sustainable leather for the branded patch on the waist. To avoid using chemicals, effects on the denim are created using lasers (yes, it really is a thing). For a pop of colour, spot the contrast stitching on the fly and pockets.
review_description: Got for my husband and they look great on him. Very pleased

As a tall person I have struggled A LOT to find trousers that fit me well, on both length and waist. Also for work i need good quality jeans that dont rip easily. My partner is also tall and recommended Boden to me. I couldnt be happier with my purchases!! Will never buy jeans anywhere else

name: Boden Slim Leg Chinos
details: Our classic chinos are the essential building blocks for your smart-casual looks – and we've made them even better this time around. They're cut from a new breathable cotton blend – that has a four-way stretch (that means it moves with your body) – with a slim fit throughout the thigh and hem, that's cut closer around the hip and seat. We've added side, coin and back pockets to be sure there's a place for everything. All you have to do is decide which versatile colour to choose.
review_description: These are a great pair of pants. The fabric is nice quality and they fit nicely. My husband didn't want to bother hemming them as they were many inches too long on him (he needs a 28 or 30 inseam) and returned them for that reason. But I would love to see these come in at least a 30" inseam and will purchase if they do.
Bought for my partner. He returned them as the slim leg was a bit too slim. So he's going to order the straight leg as they were such good quality !

name: Boden Slip on slippers
details: When only maximum comfort will do, slide your feet into our textured felt slippers. Inside, the top is lined with sherpa fabric for cosiness, and bold stripe detailing matches the padded footbed. For versatility – and maybe a spot of garden pottering – we've given them a grippy rubber outer sole.
length: When only maximum comfort will do, slide your feet into our textured felt slippers. Inside, the top is lined with sherpa fabric for cosiness, and
review_description: The slippers run small; I had to make two returns to get the right size. In the end, two sizes up from my husband's usual finally fit. Now that we have the right size, he loves them. They are very comfortable.
Lovely slippers but come up quite small so have returned size 43 and await 45.

name: Boden Supersoft Vest
details: Call off the search. With this fitted jersey top, the elusive perfect vest has been found. It's cut close to the body and has a high crew neck along with shaped armholes, so it's flattering, as well as comfortable. Because we know this one will be on constant rotation – worn on its own or as a layer – we've crafted it from a sustainable cotton blend that feels supersoft and will last through the seasons.

review_description: Bares the shoulder too much, which requires a special bra unless you want the straps to show. And even though I ordered my usual size 6, I found this tight across the bust and around the neck.
Classic navy sleeveless top. I love the higher neckline which gives it a great shape. Super soft and washed well.

review_description: This is a lovely top excellent quality . However a little bit small for me so I have returned it for an exchange these double layered tops sit so well under a blazer as the neckline doesn't gape at all . Typical high quality Boden -my favourite online shop😃

I loved this from the front but as soon as you turn round everything can be seen including my bra straps. The contrast between the thick and sleek front with the thin back is too much. This would be gorgeous if it could be double layer front and back. I had to send it back because I wouldn't be able to take my jacket/cardigan off!

Love this top , so comfy and easy to wear no fussing with anything . Great for parties or just out n about.... dress it up or down. I'm a 12 in tops and ordered a small and it's a perfect fit x

name: Boden Long Sleeve Breton Top
details: A classic is a classic for a reason. And we're known for our Bretons for pretty much that same reason.
review_description: I must be the only person who can't get a good fit in the Breton tops. I keep hoping one of them will fit or be shaped slightly differently . Nope. This time I bought the new ombre striped version -- wow the colors are bright. But I have the same fit issues I've always had: fits in shoulders and bust , loose almost baggy arms (??) boxy thru waist, then somehow more fitted/snug than expected over my hips. I have a straight build. It just looks funny on me. So alas, I'll return this one too and eventually give up trying to find a fit I can wear.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Cropped Cotton Top
details: Say hello to this sunny-day and warm-evening winner. It's crafted from soft cotton, so it's lightweight and naturally breathable. The shape is fitted and softly gathered, with elasticated bands at the top and bottom, for a secure feel and flattering look. The straps are adjustable too.
length: fitted and softly gathered, with elasticated bands at the top and bottom, for a secure feel and flattering look. The straps are adjustable too.
review_description: I got this top to match with the skirt, for a dinner night on my bachelorette, and I certainly will wear this set way beyond this year/the wedding. It is so flattering, I can't wait to wear this. I got size 6, and I'm 34'D. Fits perfectly!

I originally bought the Bluebell maxi skirt - which is gorgeous - and then immediately regretted not buying the matching cropped top which was sold out in my size 8 for months and months. I persevered and even got one which was subsequently cancelled as the account credit I thought I had I didn't and in getting it sorted it went back out of stock. FINALLY it appeared and I snapped it up. The fit is great as I did worry that it might just be too short and also too wide across the body as the style looks a bit 'puffy'. Bearing in mind that I am 60 years young it was a bit of a risk but I've no wrinkles to be concerned about on my torso so feel I can get away with it as it's not too cropped on me. Got it in the sale too so one very happy pensioner 🙂

It comes in an array of colours, so you can layer them up with shirts and knits or wear standout shades alone – just add your favourite denim.
review_description: Lovely top! The color pale green is gorgeous! The lace adds a beautiful feminine touch. Highly recommend- I'm getting a few more- ideal for layering!
I wear it under dresses and blouses for a bit of extra warmth. Perfect for this.

name: Boden Jessica Halterneck Co-ord Top
details: And just like that, you took the effort out of making an effort. Aren’t punchy co-ords great?
review_description: As my daughters graduation ceremony approached and the temperature was forecast to be 34c I had to quickly reevaluate my outfit which was perfect for a typical unpredictable English summer day but not a long day in this heat. I spotted this top and matching skirt and bought in desperation that it would fit the bill. The cotton top is fitted but not clingy and in a beautiful soft lined fabric. The skirt meets the top perfectly ((I was concerned that my midriff may be on show but it isn't). The skirt flares flatteringly and ends at my low calf and together they actually look like a dress. I don't buy items which I can't wear in a number of ways and these 2 will give me lots of options. For reference, I am a flat chested, athletic size 10 and 5'6" For once, a last minute impulse buy has turned out to be an absolute gem.

So disappointed! This is such a gorgeous top I was really looking forward to receiving it. I am a standard size 10 34B and when I put it on it looked great until I turned sidewards and could see that it really didn't fit well at the back. It seemed to gape outwards and gave me a peculiar shape. Unfortunately I had to send it back. I could order a smaller size but I have a feeling the armholes may be too small.
occasions: Semi-fitted shape

name: Boden Anais Crochet Jersey Top
details: This drapey top is crafted from a soft cotton blend – so it's pleasingly cool – and has a full shape with gentle gathers to maximise movement. Thanks to a smart crochet panel around the crew neck, you can also take it into evening-dressing territory. A neat keyhole closure at the back is a final stylish detail.
length: This drapey top is crafted from a soft cotton blend – so it's pleasingly cool – and has a full shape with gentle gathers to maximise movement.
review_description: It's super cute with basically any bottoms and the lace-like crochet detail brings it up a notch without being uncomfortable or changing the fit. Works well with my normal bra and I can tell I'm going to wear it a bunch. Plus, I tend to sweat more in the summer heat but the fit made it not show and the crochet kept it a bit open but classy!
This is really pretty. I wasn't sure how good the quality would be of the crochet, so I was pleasantly surprised that it was so nice. Great fit.

details: Call off the search. With this fitted jersey top, the elusive perfect vest has been found.
